Getting Started

CSS APIs

Link wcag-ui manually or via CDN for a dependency-free setup, or use NPM or Composer for advanced usage.

There are 4 ways to get started with wcag-ui:

Install manually

Download Pico and link /css/pico.min.css in the < head > of your website. 

<link rel="stylesheet" href="css/pico.min.css">

Usage from CDN #

Alternatively, you can use jsDelivr CDN to link pico.min.css . 

<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@picocss/pico@2/css/pico.min.css"
>

Install with NPM # 

npm install @picocss/pico

Or

yarn add @picocss/pico

Then, import Pico into your SCSS file with @use : 

@use "pico";

Learn more about the customization with Sass .

Install with Composer # 

composer require picocss/pico

Starter HTML template # 

<!doctype html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">
    <meta name="color-scheme" content="light dark">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/pico.min.css">
    <title>Hello world!</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <main class="container">
      <h1>Hello world!</h1>
    </main>
  </body>
</html>
